name: Bulk indexing of monitoring data on closed indices should throw an export exception

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.0.2-69d5b9a3881292154b4d37f3bb40f3fecf4310f2 "[xpack.monitoring.collection.enabled] setting was deprecated in Elasticsearch and will be removed in a future release. See the deprecation documentation for the next major version."
